channel.title: Need help with jar
channel.description:
Hi, I want to make a jar client for my server and then make a webclient out of it. But my jar client wont open.. And I don't know how to find my main class. client isnt the mainclass because it wont open with that one set. It is a 317 server. If you could help me I would really appreciate it.
Thanks alot!

item.title: Need help with jar
item.dc:creator: @Cam Cam
item.description:
@Cam wrote:

Opening the server means that you need the right manifest template,
the manifest is called client
Here is a link to a tutorial
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/120559-how-jar-sign-your-clients.html

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with jar
item.dc:creator: @yvesdv yvesdv
item.description:
@yvesdv wrote:

Hi,
I want to make a jar client for my server and then make a webclient out of it.
But my jar client wont open…
And I don’t know how to find my main class.
client isnt the mainclass because it wont open with that one set.
It is a 317 server.
If you could help me I would really appreciate it.

Thanks alot!
